categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Red Flight was a starfighter flight that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's starfighter corps during the Galactic Civil War. They most notably took part in the liberation of Jyn Erso.
Around 0 BBY, Red Flight was deployed to assist Extraction Team Bravo in the Wobani system against incoming Imperial forces.
Red Flight first appeared in the 2016 Star Wars Battlefront: Rogue One: X-wing VR Mission, a downloadable virtual reality add-on to the 2015 canon video game Star Wars Battlefront.
